meanings.definition: Horses bred and trained for racing.
meanings.sent1: The stable owner takes great care of the racehorses.
meanings.sent2: The racehorses sprinted down the track with incredible speed.
meanings.sent3: Why did the racehorses always win the hay bale stacking contest?
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, efficiency is key, just like with racehorses.
meanings.sent5: The thundering hooves of the racehorses echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: A group of horses competing in a race.
meanings.sent1: The crowd cheered as the racehorses crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The racehorses lined up at the starting gate, eager to begin.
meanings.sent3: Why did the racehorses throw a party after the race?
meanings.sent4: The racehorses moved in perfect harmony, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The determination in the eyes of the racehorses was palpable as they galloped forward.
